desc: Students explore various forms of poetry, including lyric and narrative, both traditional and free verse. The selection of poetry studied and the critical emphasis vary according to instructor. The course is appropriate for non-majors with broad interests. May be repeated if topics are different. Prerequisite: FYW or equivalent.
name: Top: Poetry: Surreal
notes: Open to all students who have completed FYW or equivalent.
title: Studies in Poetry
